医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
世界卫生峰会领导人警告说，世界仍未完全免受另一场大流行的影响在世界卫生峰会 (WHS) 上，全球领导人警告说，世界仍未完全免受像 COVID-19 这样的另一场流行病的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/World-still-not-complete-protected-from-another-pandemic-WHS-leaders-warn.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/World-still-not-complete-protected-from-another-pandemic-WHS-leaders-warn.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=435ba6d2-333d-4447-ae22-7d0c77861f31 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 08:19:00 -0400 World still not fully protected from another pandemic, WHS leaders warn
分析发现 1800 万英国成年人面临患糖尿病的风险伦敦医学实验室的最新分析显示，多达 1800 万英国成年人可能患有糖尿病前期，这意味着他们正处于患上 2 型糖尿病的边缘。这比通常引用的 700 万数字要高得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/18-million-British-adults-at-risk-of-developmenting-diabetes-analysis-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/18-million-British-adults-at-risk-of-developmenting-diabetes-analysis-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1fdeb6c-ab53-49b3-babf-05c7daccec74 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 08:16:00 -0400 18 million British adults at risk of developing diabetes, analysis finds
开创性的合作伙伴关系支持针对抗菌药物耐药性的早期创新，以拯救生命Innovate UK、LifeArc 和 Medicines Discovery Catapult (MDC) 联手创建了 PACE（抗菌素临床功效途径），这是一项耗资 3000 万英镑的计划，支持针对抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 的早期创新，以拯救生命。 PACE 今天（2023 年 10 月 19 日）宣布首次募集资金，提供高达 1000 万英镑的资金支持创新者开发新型抗菌药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pioneering-partnership-supports-early-stage-innovation-against-antimicrobial-resistance-to-save-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pioneering-partnership-supports-early-stage-innovation-against-antimicrobial-resistance-to-save-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=370d3682-a969-4152-a065-f3e43b4111d2 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 08:13:00 -0400 Pioneering partnership supports early-stage innovation against antimicrobial resistance to save lives
外周动脉疾病危险因素对男性和女性的影响是否不同？主要风险因素与住院或死亡有何关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Do-peripheral-artery-disease-risk-factors-impact-men-and-women- Differently.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Do-peripheral-artery-disease-risk-factors-impact-men-and-women- Differently.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aadf255e-a116-4939-be96-f9cb29aa85ec Fri, 20 Oct 2023 07:59:00 -0400 Do peripheral artery disease risk factors impact men and women differently?
乳腺癌现在的新资金支持对治疗耐药的 ER 阳性乳腺癌的研究在 Breast Cancer Now 的新资助下，研究人员正在研究最常见的乳腺癌类型如何抵抗激素治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-funding-from-Breast-Cancer-Now-supports-research-on-treatment-pressive-ER-positive-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-funding-from-Breast-Cancer-Now-supports-research-on-treatment-pressive-ER-positive-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c18b265-8678-4860-8136-0bc2b00d145f Fri, 20 Oct 2023 07:56:00 -0400 New funding from Breast Cancer Now supports research on treatment-resistant ER-positive breast cancer
邀请研究和创新界的专家解决抗菌素耐药性问题来自研究和创新界的研究人员、政策制定者和商界领袖受邀帮助应对人类最大的威胁之一——抗菌素耐药性 (AMR)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Experts-from-the-research-and-innovation-community-invited-to-tackle-anti-microbial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Experts-from-the-research-and-innovation-community-invited-to-tackle-anti-microbial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3be7c84-2f9a-4ec7-9182-c983bca2c2f5 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 07:53:00 -0400 Experts from the research and innovation community invited to tackle anti-microbial resistance
Consultant Connect 的技术可快速将全科医生与皮肤科专家联系起来英国各地的 NHS 委员会正在使用一项革命性的技术，让全科医生能够快速获得皮肤科医生顾问的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Consultant-Connecte28099sc2a0technology-quickly-connects-GPs-to-dermatology-specialists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Consultant-Connecte28099sc2a0technology-quickly-connects-GPs-to-dermatology-specialists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9588bca6-5b15-42fd-afc7-6c09b71e3e9c Fri, 20 Oct 2023 07:49:00 -0400 Consultant Connect’s technology quickly connects GPs to dermatology specialists
Anthony Lang 博士在第 26 届世界神经病学大会上揭示研究帕金森病的新模型在第 26 届世界神经病学大会的全体会议上，多伦多大学神经病学教授、杰克·克拉克帕金森病研究主席 Anthony Lang 博士揭示了一种用于识别和研究帕金森病的突破性新模型。这种新方法将帮助研究人员研究该疾病的生物学方面，这些方面可能在症状开始出现之前许多年就可以检测到。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Dr-Anthony-Lang-reveals-new-model-for-stuying-Parkinsone28099s-disease-at-the-26th-World-Congress-of-Neurology。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Dr-Anthony-Lang-reveals-new-model-for-stuying-Parkinsone28099s-disease-at-the-26th-World-Congress-of-Neurology。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7268736b-4c67-4d91-967c-995d56a62b85 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 07:47:00 -0400 Dr. Anthony Lang reveals new model for studying Parkinson’s disease at the 26th World Congress of Neurology
临床研究评估美酮治疗严重 PTSD 患者的安全性和有效性Clerkenwell Health 是一家专门为患者匹配尖端精神病学治疗的现代精神健康公司，今天宣布，该公司正在参加 Transcend Therapeutics 的 2 期研究，评估甲基龙对严重 PTSD 患者的安全性和有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Clinical-study-evaluates-safety-and-efficacy-of-methylone-in-病人-with-severe-PTSD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Clinical-study-evaluates-safety-and-efficacy-of-methylone-in-病人-with-severe-PTSD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c601594a-f8eb-405c-ab79-b76c5433e76c Fri, 20 Oct 2023 07:42:00 -0400 Clinical study evaluates safety and efficacy of methylone in patients with severe PTSD
血压变化会增加老年人患痴呆症和血管问题的风险澳大利亚研究人员的一项新研究表明，血压波动会增加老年人患痴呆症和血管问题的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Blood-Pressure-variations-can-raise-the-risk-of-dementia-and-angio-problems-in-older-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Blood-Pressure-variations-can-raise-the-risk-of-dementia-and-angio-problems-in-older-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b14feeb7-6612-4bf0-a7a9-2509ef65a052 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 07:40:00 -0400 Blood pressure variations can raise the risk of dementia and vascular problems in older people
